title: Time to Make the Doughnuts
description: This book is no longer available as a stand-alone.Josie doesn’t trust men anymore. Especially professional athletes. When Max Grant – star receiver for the Steelers – enters her bakery in a carb frenzy before dawn, she draws her weapon and prays he doesn’t make her use it.Over the next months, they become best friends and Josie realizes not all men – even athletes – are the same. Unwilling to break her trust in him, Max doesn’t notice Josie’s change of heart. Fortunately, she’s willing to spell it out.As Josie’s painful past comes roaring into her bright future…she considers running. Max has other plans. He's fully prepared to be as ruthless for her as he is on the field because he has no intention of letting her go.
author: Shayne McClendon
